message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $120. I believe it holds significant value and this price reflects its worth.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm only able to pay up to $95 for it. Looking forward to your response.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $120 is the lowest I can go. This product is highly sought after, and I'm confident it's worth the price.
